adaptive_ocr.name: adaptive_ocr
adaptive_ocr.label: Adaptive OCR
adaptive_ocr.description: Allows deriver to skip a page that would otherwise disrupt OCR

aspect_ratio.name: aspect_ratio
aspect_ratio.label: Aspect Ratio
aspect_ratio.description: Ratio of the pixel width and height of a video stream

betterpdf.name: betterpdf
betterpdf.label: Better PDF
betterpdf.description: Indicates that the derive module should create a higher quality PDF derivative (distinguishes text from background better).

bookreader-defaults.name: bookreader-defaults
bookreader-defaults.label: Bookreader defaults
bookreader-defaults.description: Indicates whether the bookreader should display one or two pages by default

bwocr.name: bwocr
bwocr.label: Black and White OCR
bwocr.description: Allows deriver to OCR specific pages as B&W if color is causing failure.

camera.name: camera
camera.label: Camera
camera.description: Camera model used during digitization process

ccnum.name: ccnum
ccnum.label: Closed Captioning Number
ccnum.description: Indicates which closed captioning file should be used for display and search

closed_captioning.name: closed_captioning
closed_captioning.label: Closed Captioning
closed_captioning.description: Indicates whether item contains closed captioning files

collection.name: collection
collection.label: Collections
collection.description: Indicates to the website what collection(s) this item belongs to.

color.name: color
color.label: Color
color.description: Indicates whether media is in color or black and white

condition-visual.name: condition-visual
condition-visual.label: Visual Condition
condition-visual.description: condition of the artwork or printed materials that accompany a media item

contributor.name: contributor
contributor.label: Contributor
contributor.description: The person or organization that provided the physical or digital media.

coverage.name: coverage
coverage.label: Coverage
coverage.description: Geographic or subject area covered by item

creator.name: creator
creator.label: Creator
creator.description: The individual(s) or organization that created the media content.

description.name: description
description.label: Item Description
description.description: Describes the media stored in the item.

external-identifier.name: external-identifier
external-identifier.label: External Identifier
external-identifier.description: URLs or identifiers to outside resources that represent the media

fixed-ppi.name: fixed-ppi
fixed-ppi.label: Fixed PPI
fixed-ppi.description: To change the ppi to a specific resolution. Usually lower especially when jp2.zip fails

identifier.name: identifier
identifier.label: Item Identifier
identifier.description: Unique identifier for an item on the archive.org web site. Used in the URL for the item, ie archive.org/details/[identifier].

language.name: language
language.label: Language
language.description: The language the media is written or recorded in.

mediatype.name: mediatype
mediatype.label: Type of Media
mediatype.description: Mediatype tells us about the main content of the item. It is used to determine how the item is displayed on the web site and may trigger special processing depending on the types of files contained in the item.

oclc-id.name: oclc-id
oclc-id.label: OCLC ID
oclc-id.description: Identifier of same edition in OCLC records

page-progression.name: page-progression
page-progression.label: Page Progression
page-progression.description: Determines direction pages will be "turned" in a book

related_collection.name: related_collection
related_collection.label: Related Collection
related_collection.description: Adds links to related collection on a collection's "About" page

related-external-id.name: related-external-id
related-external-id.label: Related External Identifier
related-external-id.description: URLs or identifiers to resources related to the media, but not representing this exact form of the work

scandate.name: scandate
scandate.label: Scan Date
scandate.description: The date and time in UTC that the media was captured.

scanner.name: scanner
scanner.label: Scanner
scanner.description: Machinery used to digitize or collect the media

sort-by.name: sort-by
sort-by.label: Default Collection Sort
sort-by.description: Allows default collection sort to be changed from the standard Views order

sound.name: sound
sound.label: Sound
sound.description: Indicates whether media has sound or is silent

sponsor.name: sponsor
sponsor.label: Sponsor
sponsor.description: The person or organization that funded the digitization or collection of this media.

subject.name: subject
subject.label: Subject/Keyword
subject.description: Subjects and/or topics covered by the media content

summary.name: summary
summary.label: Collection summary
summary.description: A summary section that appears on collection pages above the description, entire value appears at the top of the collection tab
